description: Everyone in the entertainment world is in a tizzy about the appearance of the mysterious beauty, Creamy Mami. Tachibana is searching everywhere for her, but Yuu doesn`t want to be on TV. When she hears that her friend Toshio hopes to see Mami debut, Yuu decides to appear as Mami to tell Toshio she doesn`t want to. But when Mami shows up, Tachibana also appears, taking her away and forcing her to appear on TV "just this once".

titles.title: デビュー! デビュー!!
